issue.title: allow multiple <inertial> blocks in a single Link element

content.raw: The `inherit` tag is nice to prevent copy-n-paste, but I feel doing so kind of drives sdf towards scripting territory. This feels like something that could be done in erb or xacro. Supporting something like this could also make the parser much[slightly] more complex, harder to maintain.
